events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer position and are excited to review your qualifications and experience in the development field.
Your application has been categorised under the engineering cluster after evaluating your skills and background related to software development and coding.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to your case and will be your point of contact throughout the recruitment process.
Your profile has passed the initial screening phase where we assessed your technical skills, experience, and general fit for the software engineer role.
You responded positively to our interview scheduling request and confirmed your availability for the upcoming technical evaluation.
The technical interview has been scheduled for May 7th, 2024, at 3 PM UTC, where you will be assessed on various software engineering skills.
You successfully completed the technical interview with strong performance on problem-solving and coding challenges relevant to the position.
The HR interview has been scheduled for May 10th, 2024, to discuss your fit within our company culture and review employment terms.
You completed the HR interview and impressed the team with your values, communication skills, and enthusiasm for the engineering role.
We are pleased to extend you a formal offer to join our engineering team as a Software Engineer, including competitive salary and benefits.
You have provided positive feedback about the offer and expressed excitement about joining our company and contributing to the engineering projects.
You have officially accepted the offer, and we are enthusiastic about welcoming you to our engineering team. Next steps will include onboarding.
Your onboarding process has started with access to our internal systems, orientation sessions, and introductions to your new engineering teammates.
The hiring process for the software engineer role is now complete with your successful integration into the company as a valuable team member.
